6600.name: Saint Spear - Guidance
6600.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases Accuracy by 5. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Special Ability: Guidance

6601.name: Saint Spear - Haste
6601.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases Atk. Spd. by about 7%. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Special Ability: Haste

6602.name: Demon Splinter - Focus
6602.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases critical chance by 80. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Special Ability: Focus

6603.name: Demon Splinter - Health
6603.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases Max HP by 25%. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Special Ability: Health

6604.name: Demon Splinter - Critical Stun
6604.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Has a 27% chance of casting Stun on a critical attack. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Special Ability: PvP Damage

6605.name: Heavens Divider - Haste
6605.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases Atk. Spd. by about 7%. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Special Ability: Haste

6606.name: Heavens Divider - Health
6606.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases Max HP by 25%. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Special Ability: Health

6607.name: Heavens Divider - Focus
6607.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases critical chance by 84. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Special Ability: Focus

6608.name: Arcana Mace - Acumen
6608.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases Casting Spd. by 15%. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Special Ability: Acumen

6609.name: Arcana Mace - MP Regeneration
6609.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases MP Recovery Rate. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Special Ability: MP Regeneration

6610.name: Arcana Mace - Mana Up
6610.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases Max MP by 30%. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Special Ability: Mana Up

6611.name: Infinity Blade
6611.description: Divine hero's weapon. During a critical attack, casts a P. Def.-decreasing de-buff on the target. Also causes damage shield, increases Max HP/Max MP/Max CP, and Shield Defence. Adds holy P. Atk. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Special Ability: Infinity Blade

6612.name: Infinity Cleaver
6612.description: Divine hero's weapon. During a critical attack, inflicts additional damage on the target. Also has a chance of causing skill reflect and increasing Max HP/Max CP and Critical Damage/Rate. Adds holy P. Atk. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Special Ability: Infinity Cleaver

6613.name: Infinity Axe
6613.description: Divine hero's weapon. During a critical attack, inflicts discord on the target. Also causes damage shield, and increases Max HP/Max MP/Max CP and shield rate. Adds holy P. Atk. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Special Ability: Infinity Axe

6614.name: Infinity Rod
6614.description: Divine hero's weapon. Recovers HP 100%, increases Max MP/Max CP, increases spell Casting Spd., and increases MP Regeneration Rate during magic skill use. Adds holy P. Atk. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Special Ability: Infinity Rod

6615.name: Infinity Crusher
6615.description: Divine hero's weapon. During a critical attack, inflicts stun on the target. Also has a chance of causing skill reflect and increasing Max HP/Max CP and Atk. Spd. Adds holy P. Atk. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Special Ability: Infinity Crusher

6616.name: Infinity Scepter
6616.description: Divine hero's weapon. Recovers HP 100% and adds holy P. Atk. Has a chance of increasing Max MP, Max CP, M. Atk., and M. Critical Rate, and of decreasing MP consumption and Magic Cancel Rate while using a magic skill. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Special Ability: Infinity Scepter

6617.name: Infinity Stinger
6617.description: Divine hero's weapon. During a critical attack, inflicts silence on the target. Also causes Vampiric Rage, and increases success rate when using mortal type skills. Increases Max MP/Max CP, Atk. Spd. and MP Regeneration Rate. Adds holy P. Atk. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Special Ability: Infinity Stinger

6618.name: Infinity Fang
6618.description: Divine hero's weapon. During a critical attack, inflicts stun on the target. Also has a chance of causing skill reflect and increasing Max HP/Max MP/Max CP and evasion. Adds holy P. Atk. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Special Ability: Infinity Fang

6619.name: Infinity Bow
6619.description: Divine hero's weapon. During a critical attack, inflicts slow on the target. Also causes Cheap Shot. Decreases reuse delay and increases Max MP/Max CP. Adds holy P. Atk. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Special Ability: Infinity Bow

6620.name: Infinity Wing
6620.description: Divine hero's weapon. During a critical attack, inflicts physical skill silence on the target. Also has a chance of causing skill reflect and increasing Max HP/Max MP/Max CP and Critical Rate. Adds holy P. Atk. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Special Ability: Infinity Wing

6621.name: Infinity Spear
6621.description: Divine hero's weapon. During a critical attack, inflicts cancel on the target. Also has a chance of causing skill reflect and increasing Max HP/Max CP, Atk. Spd., and Accuracy. Adds Holy P. Atk. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Special Ability: Infinity Spear

6622.name: Giant's Codex
6622.description: An item required for skill enchanting.

6643.name: Old Golden Spice
6643.description: Food for creatures on the Beast Farm. - When this food is fed to monsters that are capable of evolving, they will do so at various rates. Once a monster reaches a certain level of growth, it can then become a pet. This food also causes monsters to only drop adena. Golden Spice

6644.name: Old Crystal Spice
6644.description: Food for creatures on the Beast Farm. - When this food is fed to monsters that are capable of evolving, they will do so at various rates. Once a monster reaches a certain level of growth, it can then become a pet. This food also causes monsters to only drop materials. Crystal Spice

6645.name: Beast Soulshot
6645.description: The light of a spirit is bestowed upon a pet/servitor and temporarily increases the power of attack. The number of soulshots consumed can be viewed in the Pet/Servitor Information window. (Used in the master's inventory.) H5 Price Item - Beast Soul Shot

6646.name: Beast Spiritshot
6646.description: The light of a spirit is bestowed upon a pet/servitor and temporarily increases the power of M. Atk. The number of spiritshots consumed can be viewed in the Pet/Servitor Information window. (Used in the master's inventory.) H5 Price Item - Beast Spirit Shot

6647.name: Blessed Beast Spiritshot
6647.description: The light of a higher-level spirit is bestowed upon a pet/servitor and temporarily increases the power of M. Atk. The number of blessed spiritshots consumed can be viewed in the Pet/Servitor Information window. (Used in the master's inventory.) H5 Price Item - Beast Blessed Spirit Shot

6648.name: Baby Buffalo Panpipe
6648.description: A panpipe that is used to call a baby buffalo. The baby buffalo will take away 5 percent of the Exp that its master acquires. Wolf's Necklace

6649.name: Baby Cougar Chime
6649.description: A chime that is used to call a baby cougar. The baby cougar will take away 5 percent of the Exp that its master acquires. Wolf's Necklace

6650.name: Baby Kookaburra Ocarina
6650.description: An ocarina that is used to call a baby Kookaburra. The baby Kookaburra will take away 5 percent of the Exp that its master acquires. Wolf's Necklace

6651.name: Noblesse Gate Pass
6651.description: Expired certificate. Can be purchased from a shop.

6652.name: Scroll: Protection of Valakas
6652.description: Fire dragon's protection amulet. Upon use, resistance against Fire dragon's front attack increases. Amulet: Protection of Valakas

6654.name: Scroll: Flames of Valakas
6654.description: Removes the abnormal state resulting from the fiery breath attack of Valakas. Amulet: Flames of Valakas

6655.name: Scroll: Slay Valakas
6655.description: Increases your P. Atk. when fighting against Valakas. Amulet: Slay Valakas

6656.name: Earring of Antharas
6656.description: MP +37, Resistance to Bleed +40%, Bleed attack rate +40%, vampiric rage effect, Resistance to Stun/Mental attacks +30%, Stun/Mental attack rate +30%, decreases MP consumption, and increases heal amount and Resistance to Earth. Only one effect is applied when two of the same earrings are equipped. Earring of Antharas

6657.name: Necklace of Valakas
6657.description: MP +50, Resistance to Sleep +40%, Sleep attack rate +40%, HP +445, decreases skill reuse delay, and increases P. Atk., M. Atk., Wild Magic effect, Damage Shield effect, and Resistance to Fire. Necklace of Valakas

6658.name: Ring of Baium
6658.description: MP +21, Resistance to Poison +40%, Poison attack rate +40%, Resistance to Hold +30%, Hold attack rate +30%, increase Accuracy, Critical Damage, Atk. Spd. and Casting Spd. When equipped with two identical rings, the effect of only one ring will be applied. Ring of Baium

6660.name: Ring of Queen Ant
6660.description: MP +21, Resistance to Poison +30%, Poison attack rate +30%, increase Accuracy, increase Critical Damage, Resistance to Hold +20%, and Hold attack rate +20%. When equipped with two identical rings, the effect of only one ring will be applied. Ring of Ant Queen

6661.name: Earring of Orfen
6661.description: MP +31, Resistance to Bleed +20%, chance of Bleed attack +20%, and increase healing effects. When eqiupped with two identical earrings, the effect of only one earring will be applied. Earring of Orfen

6662.name: Ring of Core
6662.description: MP +21, Resistance to Poison +20%, Poison attack rate +20%, and increase Accuracy. When eqiupped with two identical rings, the effect of only one ring will be applied. Ring of Core

6665.name: Deluxe Chest Key - Grade 1
6665.description: An old, rusty key that cannot be used anymore. Can be sold at the shop.

6666.name: Deluxe Chest Key - Grade 2
6666.description: An old, rusty key that cannot be used anymore. Can be sold at the shop.

6667.description: An old, rusty key that cannot be used anymore. Can be sold at the shop.

6668.description: An old, rusty key that cannot be used anymore. Can be sold at the shop.

6672.name: Deluxe Chest Key - Grade 8
6672.description: An old, rusty key that cannot be used anymore. Can be sold at the shop.

6673.name: Festival Adena
6673.description: Currency used in the "2005 Lineage II Live" event.

6674.description: Sealed Imperial Crusader Breastplate. Its seal can be broken with the help of the Blacksmith of Mammon.

6687.name: Sealed Major Arcana Circlet
6687.description: Sealed Major Arcana Circlets. Its seal can be broken with the help of the Blacksmith of Mammon.

6688.name: Forgotten Blade Edge
6688.description: Main ingredient required for a Dwarf to make a Forgotten Blade. Can also be sold at ordinary shops.

6689.name: Basalt Battlehammer Head
6689.description: Main ingredient required for a Dwarf to make a Basalt Battlehammer. Can also be sold at ordinary shops.

6690.name: Imperial Staff Head
6690.description: Main ingredient required for a Dwarf to make a Imperial Staff. Can also be sold at ordinary shops.

6691.name: Angel Slayer Blade
6691.description: Main ingredient required for a Dwarf to make a Angel Slayer. Can also be sold at ordinary shops.

6693.name: Dragon Hunter Axe Blade
6693.description: Main ingredient required for a Dwarf to make a hunter axe. Can also be sold at ordinary shops.

6694.name: Saint Spear Blade
6694.description: Main ingredient required for a Dwarf to make a Saint Spear. Can also be sold at ordinary shops.

6695.name: Demon Splinter Blade

6696.description: Main ingredient required for a Dwarf to make a Heaven's Divider. Can also be sold at ordinary shops.
